          <title>
            <string language="sl">Torna elektrika</string>
            <string language="en">Friction Electricity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion Elektrizität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'Électricité De Frottement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Eletricidade Da Fricção</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Elettricità Di Attrito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρική ενέργεια τριβής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Electricidad De la Fricción</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Prikaz naelektritve kolesa pri vožji po naelektreni površini.</string>
            <string language="en">Demonstration of friction electricity which occurs when wheel is moving on charged surface.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">torna elektrika</string>
            <string language="en">friction electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">porazdelitev naboja</string>
            <string language="en">charge distribution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">jacob</string>
            <string language="en">jacob</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Demonstration von Friktion Elektrizität, die 
auftritt, wenn Rad auf belasteter Oberfläche sich verschiebt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Démonstration de l'électricité de frottement 
qui se produit quand la roue se déplace sur la surface chargée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Demonstração da eletricidade da fricção que 
ocorre quando a roda se mover na superfície carregada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dimostrazione di elettricità di attrito che 
accade quando la rotella sta muovendosi su superficie caricata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίδειξη της ηλεκτρικής ενέργειας τριβής που 
εμφανίζεται όταν κινείται η ρόδα στη χρεωμένη επιφάνεια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Demostración de la electricidad de la fricción 
que ocurre cuando la rueda se está moviendo en superficie cargada.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Friktion Elektrizität</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Ladung Verteilung</string>
